flawed_nl_solution:
Rachel has 1500 - 135 - 141 envelopes = <<1500-135-141=1224>>1224 envelopes remaining to stuff.
Rachel has 8 hours - 2 hours = <<8-2=6>>6 hours left to finish the task.
Rachel needs to stuff 1224 envelopes / 6 hours = <<1224/6=240.0>>240.0 envelopes per hour.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 204.0, not 240.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
